name: v1.14.2
body:
## Summary

In this patch release we are fixing a bug that affected the Metrics utility.

When using the utility you can [set default dimensions](https://docs.powertools.aws.dev/lambda/typescript/latest/core/metrics/#adding-default-dimensions) that will be added to every metric emitted by your application.

![carbon](https://github.com/aws-powertools/powertools-lambda-typescript/assets/7353869/e09b4988-269f-4be6-b356-c3a09081df1e)

Before this release, when setting a dimension using an existing key, the emitted [EMF blob](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch_Embedded_Metric_Format_Specification.html) would contain duplicate keys. This release fixes the bug and makes sure that keys are deduplicated correctly.

Additionally we have also improved our Gitpod configuration which should make it easier for contributors to get up and running.

## Changes

## üìú Documentation updates

* docs(maintenance): add clarification about async decorators (#1778) by @dreamorosi

## üêõ Bug and hot fixes

* fix(metrics): deduplicate dimensions when serialising (#1780) by @am29d

## üîß Maintenance

* chore(maintenance): improve Gitpod config (#1782) by @dreamorosi

## This release was made possible by the following contributors:

@am29d, @dreamorosi
